instructions: Do one of the following: When you re at the location: Open Maps, tap the Tracking Off button to show your current location, then tap Look Inside or zoom in, then tap the Browse button at the bottom of the information card. Before you get to the location: Search for the location in Maps or drag the map to show the location. Zoom in, then tap the Browse button. To find nearby services, tap a category (like Food, Restrooms, or Gates) on the information card, then swipe up to see all results, listed alphabetically. To see more information about a result, tap it. To see a map of a different floor, tap the button showing the floor level (zoom in if you don t see the button).
